title: Operation Assistant
job_overview:
Job brief
We are looking for a responsible Personal Assistant to provide operation support in a well-organized and timely manner. You will work on a one-to-one basis on a variety of tasks related to manager’s daily operation task.

Job Duty
· preparing reports, presentations and correspondence

· preparing any research that the reporting manager may require

· assisting ecommerce relative tasks (including but not limit to: replying message, Processing orders, Listing, Download & Upload file, audit current listing, and etc.)

· any other operation relative matters

Requirement

· Proficient with Microsoft Excel - Must

· Proficient with Business Math - Must

· Fluent in English - Must

· Two monitors -Prefer

· Excellent oral and written communication skills - Must

· Strong organizational skills and the ability to multitask - Must

· College / Bachelor degree – Preferred

Our company is located in East Coast, USA. Our office hour is 8:30am to 5:30pm EST USA
